Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory85.png'}
{2: '(Raise hammer)', 3: '4'}
{3: 'The hammer strikes the nail, ringing as it sinks into the ground.'}
{2: '(Raise hammer)', 3: '8'}
{3: 'With another heavy blow of the hammer, the nail is buried deeper into the frozen soil, until it strikes a hard layer of ice.'}
{3: 'This should be enough for pitching a tent. Any further into the ice, and it will be a pain to get out.'}
{3: 'Lee hands over a steaming tin cup. The faint smell of pine needles fills your nose.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's pine needle tea just brewed by Diana and Sylvia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Sylvia... Apparently, she's a technical assistance consultant sent by the Science Council.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'She used to be a negotiator for the Northern Counter-terrorism Department as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't know why the council would send a negotiator to work part-time as a technical adviser, but Asimov attests to her technical prowess.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Commandant, drink some tea and have a rest. We'll finish pitching the tent.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I really appreciate it...', 3: '21'}
{2: "But please don't.", 3: '22'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...We know the appropriate power output this time.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Promise you won't turn the nails into pancakes?", 3: '25'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Do we have spare nails we can practice on?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We're back, Commandant. We brought food and ice from the ARU.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "They're organizing a dinner party in the evening, and they invited us as well.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The dinner is on the Maria, which is quite far from the settlement. We might want to hurry.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We'll help with the tent! We Constructs can get it done in no time!", 4: '1'}
